persona.name: Danielle Reyes
persona.role: Owner of a new coffee shop opening next month
persona.goal: Get Comcast Business internet set up and schedule a callback with a Business Class sales agent to discuss plans and installation timing.
persona.context: She’s signing a lease for a small storefront and needs reliable internet for POS, guest Wi‑Fi, and security cameras. She’s comparing providers and wants a quote and realistic install timeline before committing.
